decision_conditions: Hard and soft landscaping child play
Post completion noise survey and noise
description: Demolition of a garage and associated buildings including a substation at No. 2 Station Road, redevelopment of the Bromley North Station Road car park to provide 75 residential units with 260.8sq.m(GIA) commercial floor space (Use Class Order Class E), provision of disabled parking spaces with electric vehicle charging points, cycle parking, a landscaped outdoor space and associated works.

open_spaces_details.description: Play space for children. Additional public open space is also provided (more details can be found in the landscape strategy)
open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Provision for children and young people
